plot: Toby's intuition that there may be something more to Detective Charlie Marks' pursuit of a serial rapist brings them closer.

When it appears a serial rapist has struck again, Toby senses Detective Marks' guilt over failing to convict him before. Using his telepathic powers, Toby helps gather intelligence from a traumatized victim only to realize that Marks may have some deep wounds of her own. Meanwhile, Dr. Olivia Fawcett tangles with a patient, her former high school teacher, who refuses to show her respect.—Shaftesbury Films
